column5: Pfffft.. Nice fish, I guess
Nice day fishing!
Nice fish.  Thanx for the report.  U really R in God's country.  I lived in Thunder Bay in 1972.  Wish I was still there.
Stellar fish Simon.  I'm moving to Nipigon for the summers in 2023 and will be visiting you and Ben regularily. lol.
very nice simon !!!! what time is dinner.??

Thanks solo....erm...i mean Mike.  Thanks Matt....come on up!  BWAHAHAHAHA......LOL.  Thanks Bruce  Yeah, they have some pretty decent whitie fishing in that area.  LOL.....now that would be a G2G for sure! Welcome any time bro!  making the whitefish jambolaya tomorrow.....be here around 6pm......hope you like home made garlic bread too.
oooooohhhhhhh yeah!!!!!! first place is whats in store for us this year!!!!!....Save the big guys for next week Simon....Nice shootin!
Will do my best...planning to hit up the same spot on Saturday....should be able to get a walleye soon after the starting gun goes off!
haha, glad you took it in stride Limey! We gotta crap talk now the comp is about to begin.  You wanna hit sawbill or Dore next weekend?

Already planning on hitting up the lake in this report on Saturday. Saturday is the only day i really have to go fishing for the next week and a bit....wanna join us? More than enough room on my sled.
Make me drool, you does.    You don't forget days like that.
It always warms up a cold, dark, winter night to read a Limey post and pictures. Thanks
Looks like I'm off to LOTW saturday.  D'OH, we'll get out soon!

Hi all,   Went for some Lakers and whitefish today with the plan of heading 30kms into the bush afterwards to chase walleye too. The whitefish and trout cooperated and just as we were going to head out to the next lake so we could be there before dark......I lost a whitefish at the hole and before i could shout "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" .......my buddy Cliff's reflexes kicked in and he had his arm down the hole up to his shoulder attempting to get it back......DOH! He spent the next 45 minutes drying out clothes in the shack....we never made it for walleye.   We did did get around 20 whities and 2 nice trout.  Cliffs trout was 32" long with a 17'girth.......mine was also 17" girth but shorter at 28".  Cliff said that was the best fight he had ever had on the ice which made my day as this was the first time i had brought him to this lake....after many stories of how good the fishing can be.   Jigs and really tiny minnows got cliff all his fish including the big trout, and i got my whities on crappie tubes and the trout on a 6" dace minnow on a circle hook.   All fish in the 36' - 40' FOW range.   Next weekend we intend to do the same but make time for walleye again...Cliff promises to stay dry till we achieve that....lol.
Awasum catch And your buddy 3   For the effort.
Nice! Glad the tourney hasn't started yet  lol
Is that lake named  HEAVEN ?   nice catch !
That just make me jealous Simon. I think those are some of the biggest lakers you've posted! If I didn't know you, I'd guess that was from Lake Simcoe!
Awesome fishing Simon....
Both the lakers are beauties ... and nice going on the whities ...
Absolute tanks...what an awesome trip
Beautiful!!! Nice report.
Simon.. stop this nonsense already!!
Nice work Simon.  Don't you love it when a plan comes together?
I think the place he lives is called HEAVEN!! Great day on the ice Simon, nice fishes

awesome

Yup.......its a pretty awesome lake....but it can be a real stubborn one too......yesterday the fishing gods were with us.  pretty close to the biggest ones iv'e posted......awesome fight they put up!   Thanks   Thanks...was a blast for sure    Thanks Wayne  yup love it...next week we will try to get some walleye to play too.  Thanks man
Thanks dood  THANKS tERRY  Thanks Joey  My pleasure  HAHA...you'd know Ben....maybe next weekend eh?.......sorry i missed Grahams visit up here at Xmas.  it was a hoot for sure  Thanks man
Just outstanding!
Wow, simply awesome!    After a very solid Laker season on soft water myself, I have to admit I'm really missing them. Might have to do a road trip.  Nice fish!
